Summary: Amazons Inc Pantry Access and Visibility
As a customer, I want to access ABC Pantry from the homepage so that I can easily find and purchase daily essential items.
As a marketing manager, I want to display up to five ads on ABC Pantry so that we can generate ad revenue without disturbing the user experience.
As a customer, I want to add both essential and non-essential products to a single shopping cart so that I can place one combined order.
As a customer, I want to be notified if my order is below $30 so that I know I must add more items before checking out.
As a customer, I want to know if my order qualifies for free delivery so that I can decide whether to add more items to save on delivery charges.
As an operations analyst, I want sales to be categorized by zone (1 to 4) so that I can analyze regional performance.
As a business manager, I want daily, weekly, and category-based sales reports so that I can monitor performance and plan inventory.
